title: You agree to defend, indemnify, and hold the service harmless in case of a claim related to your use of the service
quoteText: You agree to defend, indemnify and hold harmless CNN, its affiliates and their respective directors, officers, employees and agents from and against all claims and expenses, including attorneys' fees, arising out of the use of the Site by you or your Account.
